detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Services
detailsData.content: We provide comprehensive transactional legal services and counsel to entrepreneurs and business ventures at all stages of their life cycles. We work in a broad range of industries, including software, financial services, cleantech, and more.

detailsData.title: Strategic Partnerships
detailsData.content: Our mission is not just to successfully complete transactions, but to serve as a strategic partner toward our clients' growth and success. By getting to know our clients, their work, goals, and needs, we cultivate ongoing relationships.

detailsData.title: Affordable Counsel
detailsData.content: We provide comprehensive, affordable legal counsel to entrepreneurs involved in starting, running, or selling a business. We are committed to providing a competitive, dependable value proposition to every one of our clients.

detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: Jerry O’Connor has built his practice on the representation of technology entrepreneurs for over 20 years. He has practiced in this complex and rapidly-evolving area of the law at leading area firms before founding his own practice.

subHeading: Comprehensive Transactional Legal Services for Entrepreneurs
valueProp: O'Connor Law Office provides comprehensive transactional legal services and counsel to entrepreneurs and business ventures at all stages of their life cycles. We work in a broad range of industries, including software and information technology, financial services, cleantech and renewable energy, life science, clean energy technology, manufacturing, and professional services.

testimonalData.text: O'Connor Law Office provided exceptional legal services for our startup. Their strategic advice was invaluable.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Jerry O’Connor's expertise in technology law helped us navigate complex legal challenges with ease.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: The team at O'Connor Law Office is dedicated and professional. They truly understand the needs of entrepreneurs.
testimonalData.author: Michael Johnson
